translations: v．释放，解开（尤指使其突然或猛烈地行动）

sentences.sentence: Five minutes into my journey the sky unleashes a torrent of rain.
sentences.translation: 我出发五分钟后就下起了瓢泼大雨。

sentences.sentence: It's surely only a matter of time before Microsoft unleashes its iPad killer on the world.
sentences.translation: 微软将其iPad杀手公诸于世将仅仅是个时间问题。

sentences.sentence: It unleashes your desire to achieve your objectives and supports your efforts to get there.
sentences.translation: 它会发动你的要求去实现你的目标并且支持着你去努力得到。
